priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire DAD Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C105130

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire DAD Test Code Terminology

definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia test code.
name: Disability Assessment for Dementia Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire DAD Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Disability Assessment for Dementia Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to wash himself/herself or to take a bath or shower?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Wash or Take a Bath or Shower

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to brush his/her teeth or care for his/her dentures?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Brush Teeth or Care for Dentures

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to care for his/her hair (wash and comb)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Care for His/Her Hair

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Prepare the water, towels, and soap for washing, taking a bath or a shower?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Prepare the Water, Towels, and Soap for Washing, Taking a Bath or Shower

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Wash and dry all parts of his/her body safely and completely?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Wash and Dry All Parts of Body Safely and Completely

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Brush his/her teeth or take care of his/her dentures appropriately?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Brush Teeth or Take Care of Dentures Appropriately
synonyms: DAD01-Brush Teeth Take Care of Dentures

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Take care of his/her hair (wash and comb)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Take Care of His/Her Hair

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to dress himself/herself?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Dress Himself/Herself

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Choose appropriate clothing (with regard to the occasion, neatness, the weather and color combination)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Choose Appropriate Clothing

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Dress himself/herself in the appropriate order (undergarments, pant/dress, shoes)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Dress in the Appropriate Order

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Dress himself/herself completely?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Dress Himself/Herself Completely

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Undress himself/herself completely?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Undress Himself/Herself Completely

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to use the toilet at appropriate times?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Use the Toilet at Appropriate Times

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Use the toilet without 'accidents'?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Use the Toilet Without Accidents

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide that he/she needs to eat?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide That He/She Needs to Eat
synonyms: DAD01-Decide That He/She Needs to Eat

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Choose appropriate utensils and seasonings when eating?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Choose Appropriate Utensils and Seasonings When Eating

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Eat his/her meals at a normal pace and with appropriate manners?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Eat Meals at a Normal Pace and with Appropriate Manners
synonyms: DAD01-Eat at Normal Pace With Manners

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to prepare a light meal or snack for himself/herself?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Prepare a Light Meal or Snack for Himself/Herself

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Adequately plan a light meal or snack (ingredients, cookware)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Adequately Plan a Light Meal or Snack

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Prepare or cook a light meal or a snack safely?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Safely Prepare or Cook a Light Meal or Snack
synonyms: DAD01-Prepare or Cook Light Meal Snack

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Attempt to telephone someone at a suitable time?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Attempt to Telephone Someone at a Suitable Time

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Find and dial a telephone number correctly?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Find and Dial a Telephone Number Correctly

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Carry out an appropriate telephone conversation?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Carry Out an Appropriate Telephone Conversation

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Write and convey a telephone message adequately?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Write and Convey a Telephone Message Adequately

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to go out (walk, visit, shop) at an appropriate time?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Go Out at an Appropriate Time

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Adequately organize an outing with respect to transportation, keys, destination, weather, necessary money, shopping list?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Adequately Organize an Outing with Respect to Transportation, Keys, Destination, Weather, Money, Shopping List

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Go out and reach a familiar destination without getting lost?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Go Out and Reach a Familiar Destination Without Getting Lost

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Safely take the adequate mode of transportation (car, bus, taxi)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Safely Take the Adequate Mode of Transportation

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Return from the store with the appropriate items?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Return From the Store with Appropriate Items

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Show an interest in his/her personal affairs such as his/her finances and written correspondence?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Show an Interest in Personal Affairs such as Finances and Written Correspondence

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Organize his/her finances to pay his/her bills (checks, bank statement, bills)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Organize Finances to Pay Bills

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Adequately organize his/her correspondence with respect to stationery, address, stamps?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Adequately Organize Correspondence

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Handle his/her money adequately (deal with cash)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Handle Money Adequately

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Decide to take his/her medications at the correct time?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Decide to Take Medications at the Correct Time

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Take his/her medications as prescribed (according to the right dosage)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Take Medications as Prescribed

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Show an interest in leisure activity(ies)?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Show an Interest in Leisure Activities

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Take an interest in household chores that he/she used to perform in the past?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Take an Interest in Household Chores as in the Past

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Plan and organize adequately household chores that he/she used to perform in the past?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Plan and Organize Adequately Household Chores as in the Past

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Complete household chores adequately as he/she used to perform in the past?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Complete Household Chores Adequately as in the Past

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Stay safely at home by himself/herself when needed?
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Stay Safely at Home When Needed
synonyms: DAD01-Stay Safely at Home When Needed

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Sub-Total Initiation.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Sub-Total Initiation

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Sub-Total Initiation Number of Applicable Items.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Total Initiation Number of Applicable Items

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Sub-Total Planning & Organization.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Sub-Total Planning and Organization

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Sub-Total Planning & Organization Number of Applicable Items.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Plan and Organize Number of Applicable Items

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Sub-Total Effective Performance.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Sub-Total Effective Performance

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Sub-Total Effective Performance Number of Applicable Items.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Sub-Total Effective Performance Number of Applicable Items

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Total Score.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Total Score

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Total Number of Applicable Items.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Total Number of Applicable Items

terms.definition: Disability Assessment for Dementia - Total %.
terms.preferredTerm: DAD - Total Percent
